overview: When it turns out the girls cannot make it to the camping trip. The guys decide to explore their wild side. Watch as new guy Carter Bentley finds out that sex with a guy can be just as hot as it can be with a girl, maybe even hotter. Carter's camping buddies Jason Phisher, Blaze Breaker, Blake Holden, Haven Johnson and Drake Corrigan all agree. Camping can be a lot of fun, especially if it's with some Frisky Campers.
title: Frisky Campers
